What's strange is that the domain gordiandata.com isn't a=
 valid
domain. It points to one of those reserved domain name pages, and no=
t
a real wesbite.

Something like the JS extractor created this URI.

My pr=
oblem is that the server is returning 302 status for all the URI,
but after=
 requesting about a 100 bad URIs the server starts refusing
connections. Th=
is appears to get Heritrix stuck, because it just sits
there for hours not =
crawling.

What can I do to help resolve this problem?

Is it possible for =
Heritrix to detect this kind of problem and then
remove the seed?
